name: Gales of Reverie
title: Wanderer: Gales of Reverie
in_play_description: When your {REALNAME[ID(1)|DELAYHANDLE(true)]} with this card equpped is in Windfavored state and after using Charged Attack: you will spend 1 less Elemental Die the next time you use "Switch Character" and deal 1 Anemo DMG.

attributes.source: Reward for inviting the Wanderer to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc:
Combat Action: When your active character is {REALNAME[ID(1)|DELAYHANDLE(true)]}, equip this card.
After {REALNAME[ID(1)|DELAYHANDLE(true)]} equips this card, immediately use Hanega: Song of the Wind once.
When your {REALNAME[ID(1)|DELAYHANDLE(true)]}, who has this card equipped, is in Windfavored state and after using Charged Attack: you will spend 1 less Elemental Die the next time you use "Switch Character" and deal 1 Anemo DMG.
(You must have {REALNAME[ID(1)|DELAYHANDLE(true)]} in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
